documentation.purpose: Hooks for automatic plugin validation and developer assistance

pre-commit.description: Validates plugin files before git commit
behavior: Runs all validation scripts (naming, JSON, frontmatter)

tool-use.description: Provides validation hints when editing plugin files
tool-use.trigger: Before Write or Edit tool use
behavior: Warns about common mistakes (author string vs object)
Checks naming conventions on new files

user-prompt-submit.description: Suggests validation commands based on user intent
behavior: Provides command discovery for help requests

documentation.usage: Hooks are automatically activated when plugin-formatter is installed
